name: RQG_MPI_HX
description: The RQG_MPI_HX table contains MPI ID history information for the Requisition Grouper (RQG) master file.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the requisition grouper record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID
columns.description: The Identity ID history for this record.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The changes to the ID type. This column is frequently used to link to the IDENTITY_ID_TYPE table.

columns.name: MPI_HX_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_HX_NEW_ID
columns.description: The new Identity ID for this record.
